meanings.sent1: She had the gulpiest drink at the party.
meanings.sent2: The biggest and gulpiest fish in the pond was easy to spot.
meanings.sent3: The gulpiest eater in the family finished their meal in record time.
meanings.sent4: His thirst was so strong, it felt like he had the gulpiest throat in the world.
meanings.sent5: The gulpiest waterfall cascaded down the rocks with great force.

meanings.definition: Most likely to gulp or swallow quickly and eagerly.
meanings.sent1: The gulpiest dog in the park finished its water in seconds.
meanings.sent2: She was the gulpiest eater at the table, finishing her meal before anyone else.
meanings.sent3: The gulpiest squirrel in the forest always managed to grab the most nuts.
meanings.sent4: His hunger was so intense, he felt like the gulpiest person alive.
meanings.sent5: The gulpiest vacuum cleaner sucked up all the crumbs in no time.
